titleStmt.title: A representation of the Popish Plott in 29 figures, as ye manner of killing Sr. Edmond bury Godfry, & their horid designes to kill the King, and the manner of the plotters execution

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold by Robert Greene, at the Rose and Crowne in Budge Rowe,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
With caption titles for each figure.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
